prompt.content: Calculate the difference between Adobe's (NYSE:ADBE) adjusted effective tax rate and its GAAP effective tax rate in FY 2024.

rubrics.name: Identify the correct filing as the 2024 FY 10K for the year ended November 29th 2024.

messages.content: Identify the correct filing as the 2024 FY 10K for the year ended November 29th 2024.

rubrics.name: State Adobe's GAAP effective tax rate as 20%.

messages.content: State Adobe's GAAP effective tax rate as 20%.

rubrics.name: State Adobe's adjusted effective tax rate as 18.5%.

messages.content: State Adobe's adjusted effective tax rate as 18.5%.

rubrics.name: Find the difference between the adjusted and GAAP rates as 18.5%-20%=-1.5%

messages.content: Find the difference between the adjusted and GAAP rates as 18.5%-20%=-1.5%
